content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, there were no new developments to report. I used the command "google" to search for resources about love and different languages. My computer returned a list of websites, including 5lovelanguages.com and fluentin3months.com. I also used the command "browse_website" to search for information on exploring the world on lonelyplanet.com.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides information on exploring the world through various destinations, travel interests, and practicalities. \n \n Links: ['Check out our trending guides (https://shop.lonelyplanet.com/collections/trending-destinations)', ' (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/)', 'Sign In (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/api/auth/login)', ' Saved lists (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile)', 'Account settings (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile/settings)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "pip install pandas"}}}'}]
"""
